0x057e321850c75b45c5293ea260551047ff3093.name: Olena Competitions Registry
0x057e321850c75b45c5293ea260551047ff3093.description: Allows users to interact with the Olena competitions registry contract.

methods.name: Register User
methods.description: A method to register a new world id verified user.

0x032cf6562db58c2e8995d61d098bde2df73487.name: Olena Competition
0x032cf6562db58c2e8995d61d098bde2df73487.description: Allows users to interact with the Olena competition contract.

methods.name: Cast Vote
methods.description: A method that allows users to cast a vote for a market in a competition.

methods.name: Claim Market Refund
methods.description: A method that allows users to claim their VP (Voting Power) refund for a terminated market in a competition.

0x038edc05c9aeb53af29770ac87164b5a884ddc.name: Olena Reward Token
0x038edc05c9aeb53af29770ac87164b5a884ddc.description: Allows users to interact with the Olena reward token contract.

methods.name: Claim Airdrop
methods.description: A method that allows users to claim their airdrop allocation.
